document_data.mainbody:
amps by Watt was a specialty shop found in the Temple District of Ravens Bluff during the midâ€“14 century DR. They sold all manner of lighting fixtures and paraphernalia, including wall lamps, chandeliers, torches, sconces, and lanterns. They specialized in items and fixtures made of brass. 
Highlighted by a bright yellow awning over the front entrance, this small and well-lit shop was quite prosperous among Ravenian home-and-land-owners. It had prime real estate, located on the corner of OKane Court and Hawk Passage, within the Swordspoint neighborhood.
